column2: @DerelictMyBal @TheRaDR 1991 Ragman series tied the rag-suit to the Golem—and thgreat Golem was even a character
@gedaliap @TheRaDR That’s possible  but I’ve never heard of Kirby or Stan Lee saying Golem was direct inspiration
This Golem dude sounds like Daffy Duck and really would like to see something eat or kill it.
